domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Automotive, Aircraft & Boat Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

domain.name: Business Taxonomy
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies
domain.description: Interests, opinions, and behaviors of individuals, groups, or cultures; like Speciality Cooking or Theme Parks

data.text: @ShemekNowak Hi! We're sorry to hear that you've had this experience with us. Please fill out the complaints form on our official website and the colleagues will look into it for you: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV

@tayxzir Hi, sorry to hear you've been waiting so long. Please give us a call on our assistance line (local rates) and our colleagues can help right away. Numbers are here: https://t.co/3TxHxhckDD. Another option is to send us an official claim here: https://t.co/F1LYZYRxMV

data.text: @sophieofcourse Hi There! Please accept our sincere apologies for this inconvenience. Our colleagues fixed the problem in a short period of time. If this situation caused you extra cost, please submit a claim via https://t.co/TPxWxTxCLK, our colleagues will assist you as soon as possible.
@SusannahDushaj Hi. We're not operating flights on the route until further notice starting from the 24th of September. We're sorry about any caused inconviniences.

data.text: @poldarsky Hi There! Please accept our sincere apologies for this inconvenience. Our colleagues fixed the problem in a short period of time. If this situation caused you extra cost, please submit a claim via https://t.co/TPxWxTxCLK, our colleagues will assist you as soon as possible.

Wizz Air wants to show sincere gratitude to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II for her lifetime service to the UK and the world.
May she rest in peace. https://t.co/kO8zhIw2e0

data.text: @alexVlazar Hi Alex! We apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.
@so_cruel Hi Rik! You can call us via 8 958 954 416, if you have an existing booking, you can also use 0036 1677 7521 number. Our colleagues will assist you as soon as possible.

data.text: @ginabins Hi Gina! We apologize for the inconvenience. Our colleagues worked on the problem and it is solved in a short period of time. We hope that you managed checking-in on time. If you did not, please submit a claim via https://t.co/ZyZM8nHQSB, our colleagues can assist you. Thank you!
